thread.section_title: The Nadler Victoria - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Friendly staff
thread.title_full: Friendly staff - Review of The Nadler Victoria, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Annemie66
title: Friendly staff
text: I've stayed in this neat, comfortable, silent and conveniently situated hotel several times over the last couple months. The kitchenette with microwave, dishes and cutlery, kettle, coffee machine and Brita water in the room comes in very handy. But above all it is always a pleasure to be welcomed by Silvia, Carmen, Nauris, Ataur or Francesco, part of the friendly and helpful staff.
